Back to Franz Liszt

Franz Liszt

Variation über einen Walzer von Diabelli, S. 147

c. 1822 · LW A1 · R. 26

[Wikipedia] · [IMSLP]

For the collaborative Vaterländischer Künstlerverein, fifty composers, including Liszt, composed a single variation each on a theme by Anton Diabelli.

Recommended editions

  • New Liszt Edition (Editio Musica Budapest) · II/1 · Z. A/B 8766 · Free Arrangements I · ed. Györgyi Éger / Géza Gémesi / Imre Mező / Imre Sulyok

Duration: 1'

Difficulty: 3
